title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 205.4 - Hours of operation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 205.4 - Hours of operation

State Regulations

Walkways and bikeways, where provided, shall be open for use
each day at a minimum between dawn and dusk, aside from any disruptions caused
by weather, safety concerns, or maintenance related activity. The Authority
shall set by board resolution specific hours of operation at each bridge's
walkway and/or bikeway based on the particular needs of each
facility. Notes

New

York State Register November 9, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 45, eff. 11/9/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
